sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const TermsAndConditions = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions

Last Updated: [2 July 2024]

These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website dripsaint.com and our services, including the MidJourney Bot for AI-generated designs. By accessing or using the Site and our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using the Site and our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Site or services.

2. Use of the Site and Services

Eligibility:
You must be at least 13 years old to use our Site and services. If you are under 18, you may use the Site and services only with the involvement of a parent or guardian.

Account Registration:
To access certain features of our Site and services, you may need to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

User Conduct:
You agree not to use the Site and services for any unlawful or prohibited purpose. You agree not to engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the Site and services.

AI-Generated Designs:
Users who are not registered or signed in are limited to 7 prompts for generating designs using the MidJourney Bot. To access additional prompts, users must sign up and create an account.

3. Orders and Payments

Product Descriptions:
We strive to ensure that the product descriptions on our Site are accurate. However, we do not warrant that the descriptions, colors, or other content available on the Site are accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free.

Pricing:
All prices are subject to change without notice. The price charged for a product will be the price in effect at the time the order is placed and will be set out in your order confirmation email.

Payments:
All payments are processed through third-party payment processors. We do not store or have access to your payment information.

4. Replacement Policy

Please refer to our Replacement Policy for information on our replacement terms and conditions.

5. Design Appropriateness

Appropriate Content:
We reserve the right to review all designs submitted through our services. If we determine that a design is inappropriate in any sense, including but not limited to being offensive, discriminatory, or infringing on intellectual property rights, we reserve the right to cancel your order.

Cancellation:
If your order is canceled due to inappropriate content, we will notify you via email and refund any payments made for the order.

6. Intellectual Property

All content on the Site, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Drip Saint or its content suppliers and protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not use any content from the Site without our prior written consent.

7. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Drip Saint shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from:

  • Your use of or inability to use the Site and services.
  • Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or any personal information stored therein.
  • Any bugs, viruses, trojan horses, or the like that may be transmitted to or through our Site by any third party.

8. Changes to the Terms

We may update these Terms from time to time. If we make material changes, we will notify you by posting the updated Terms on our Site and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the Site and services after the changes have been made will constitute your acceptance of the updated Terms.

9. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your State/Country], without regard to its conflict of law principles.

By using our Site and services, you agree to these Terms of Use.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
